message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1200000. I understand its significance and would like to offer it to you at a special price that reflects its true worth while ensuring you get an exceptional deal. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $950000. This price not only secures you a significant saving but also ensures a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the details of the purchase.
